item.title: ‘Make Assassinations Great Again’: Leftist Demonstrators Call For Murder Of Trump
item.description: We now live in a society where the left not only accepts but celebrates throngs of haters carrying signs calling for murder.

item.title: Foreign Interference? Leftist Groups Try To Nuke Voter Citizenship Rule Supported By 83% Of Americans
item.description: Leftist 'voter rights' groups are throwing all they can at stopping the EAC from changing the registration form to ensure only U.S. citizens can vote.

item.title: 60 Minutes Takes Left-Wing Propaganda To A New Level With Discredited Ex-DOJ Lawyer Interview
item.description: 60 Minutes tried its very hardest to portray Erez Reuveni as a courageous hero who was victimized by a lawless Trump-run DOJ.

item.title: Democrats Have Become The Party Of Grumpy Elderly People
item.description: No kings? More like no young people. On Saturday, several so-called “No Kings” protests took place across the country. The protests looked more like a...

item.title: Wisconsin Officials Violated Voter Registration Laws During Record-Breaking Election
item.description: More than 30 election offices failed to inactivate suspect registrants after the state's nationally-watched Supreme Court election.
